Package cafe

Class Coffee

java.lang.Object
cafe.MenuItem
cafe.Coffee
All Implemented Interfaces:
Customizable
public class Coffee
extends MenuItem
implements Customizable
This is the Coffee class to create coffee objects for orders and store their corresponding information.
Author:
Dhvani Kakabalia, Kuhu Halder
